post:
Hello,

The VPS specs are:

**KVM SSD Limited**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon L5520
Unlimited CPU core 2.27GHz
2GB RAM
12GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Bandwidth 250Mbit
Traffic 1TB
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - Los Angeles (Colo@)
Price - $3.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=40
</pre>

**KVM SSD i7**

<pre>
1 vCPU core i7-4790K
Unlimited CPU core 4.2GHz Turbo
2GB RAM
40GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbit bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - Canada (OVH)
Price - $5.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=41
</pre>

**KVM SSD**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E3-1245v2
Unlimited CPU core 3.6GHz Turbo
2GB RAM
60GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbit bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $4.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=27
</pre>

**KVM HDD Limited**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E5-1620 v2
Unlimited CPU core 3.7GHz
2GB ECC RAM
200GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $3.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=29
</pre>

**KVM HDD Plus**

<pre>
2 vCPU core AMD Opteron 6128
Unlimited CPU cores 2GHz
8GB ECC RAM
200GB HDD RAID-1
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $6.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=35
</pre>

Each KVM package has a limit of 4 VMs, so you can request a private networking and setup up to 4 VMs. Also you can order several packages of the same type and combine them into one VM.

The payment gateway is Bitpay (Bitcoin) or 2Checkout (PayPal), it is also possible to pay via Skrill manually, just open a ticket.

https://www.wishosting.com
